item.title: Custom TLS certificates
item.description: Background LocalStack sometimes performs on-demand fetching of resources from the public internet. This requires that LocalStack is able to access public URLs. If there is a proxy server in your network that uses a non-standard TLS certificate, LocalStack will not be able to download any files on demand. You may see errors in the logs relating to TLS such as “unable to get local issuer certificate”. There are three options when running LocalStack:
